TJoystickDPad Enumeration

Summary

DPad standard values (from 0 to 365° and 65535 when not value is selected)

Unit: Gamolf.RTL.Joystick
Syntax
Delphi
type TJoystickDPad = TJoystickDPad.Top..TJoystickDPad.Center
